Klasse Triangle

java.lang.Object
Triangle
public class Triangle extends Object
A triangle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    Triangle()
    Create a new triangle at default position with default color.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifikator und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    void
    changeColor(String newColor)
    Change the color.
    void
    changeSize(int newHeight, int newWidth)
    Change the size to the new size (in pixels).
    void
    makeInvisible()
    Make this triangle invisible.
    void
    makeVisible()
    Make this triangle visible.
    void
    moveDown()
    Move the triangle a few pixels down.
    void
    moveHorizontal(int distance)
    Move the triangle horizontally by 'distance' pixels.
    void
    moveLeft()
    Move the triangle a few pixels to the left.
    void

    Move the triangle a few pixels to the right.
    void

    Move the triangle a few pixels up.

    Move the triangle vertically by 'distance' pixels.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Triangle

      public Triangle()
      Create a new triangle at default position with default color.

  • Methodendetails

    • makeVisible

      public void makeVisible()
      Make this triangle visible. If it was already visible, do nothing.

    • makeInvisible

      public void makeInvisible()
      Make this triangle invisible. If it was already invisible, do nothing.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      Move the triangle a few pixels to the right.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      Move the triangle a few pixels to the left.

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Move the triangle a few pixels up.

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Move the triangle a few pixels down.

    • moveHorizontal

      public void moveHorizontal(int distance)
      Move the triangle horizontally by 'distance' pixels.

    • moveVertical

      public void moveVertical(int distance)
      Move the triangle vertically by 'distance' pixels.

    • slowMoveHorizontal

      public void slowMoveHorizontal(int distance)
      Slowly move the triangle horizontally by 'distance' pixels.

    • slowMoveVertical

      public void slowMoveVertical(int distance)
      Slowly move the triangle vertically by 'distance' pixels.

    • changeSize

      public void changeSize(int newHeight, int newWidth)
      Change the size to the new size (in pixels). Size must be >= 0.

    • changeColor

      public void changeColor(String newColor)
      Change the color. Valid colors are "red", "yellow", "blue", "green", "magenta" and "black".
